title: What did Hitler say about FDR? - Quora

response.answer_text: In his rambling war speech to the Reichstag Hitler accused Roosevelt of being a secret communist—if not a secret Jew—and of being responsible for all the conflicts and crises then present in the world. Of course **Der Fuehrer** did not ask the Reichstag for a declaration of war. He simply announced it to them after it was done.

Not all that much. American plutocrat, born with a silver spoon in his mouth, whilst he (AH) had had to make his own way in the world, a dandy as opposed to AH having been a frontline, decorated soldier, etc. Nothing really to get worked up about.
